parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.04

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks if fireplace is inflamed (burning) or not. To check if a unit is receiving damage from fire, use [[isBurning]] command.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''inflamed''' fireplace

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> fireplace: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_inflamed = [[inflamed]] _fireplaceOne;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[inflame]], [[isBurning]]
</value></part></template>
